### Introduction
Nudibranchs are an order of benthic soft-bodied molluscs.They are often referred to as "sea rabbits" and are easily spottable a fascinating palette of colours


# Classification
**Kingdom:** Animalia 
**Phylum:** Mollusca 
**Class:** Gastropoda 
**Subclass:** Heterobranchia 
**Clade:** Nudipleura 
**Order:** Nudibranchia
